name: Shoot Dukem
description:
A short game made in about 10 hours as a challenge (it says 16 hours in the project's name but that's irrelevant). Your name is Shoot Dukem, and you are the shootiest of them all. Shoot all enemies with your gun to win the game.

Assets used:

  • Top-down shooter asset pack by Kenney - https://opengameart.org/content/topdown-shooter
  • Gunloop 8 bit by Luke.RUSTLTD - https://opengameart.org/content/gunloop-8bit
  • Simple Action beat by 3uhox - https://opengameart.org/content/simple-action-beat
  • Applause sound effect by Blender Foundation (submitted by LeeZH) - https://opengameart.org/content/applause
  • Pain sound effects by EmoPreben - https://opengameart.org/content/pain-sounds-by-emopreben
  • Hurt/Death sound effects by Badre-Eddine - https://opengameart.org/content/hurt-death-sound-effect-for-character
  • Fireworks sprite by jellyfizh - https://opengameart.org/content/fireworks-effect-spritesheet

Big thanks to Romi Fauzi for showing how to use NavMeshPlus and to the creators of NavMeshPlus itself. Also big thanks to Sebastian Lague for this YouTube tutorial for Field of View.
